## OctreeNodeChunk.getWorldSize() method

Root world size of the octree.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWorldSize(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The root world size (edge length) of the octree.

## Remarks

Same across all chunks; used to convert between world coordinates and indices.
